input: Create a batch query to find mandates valid in 2025 with a creditor ID 'DE444555666' and expand all related entities.

output.body:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /DirectDebitMandates?$filter=year(ValidityPeriod/StartDate) eq 2025 and CreditorPartyID eq 'DE444555666'&$expand=* HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--
